descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
**SEGA’s futuristic sports classic is reimagined for VR!**

**C-Smash VRS** fuses low-gravity racket action with block-breaking gameplay and sleek, cosmic style. **Smash**, **dash**, and **sweat** your way through a full-body experience built to break records and push your limits.

**Key Features**
- 🎮 Single-player, Versus, Co-Op, and Infinity Modes
- 💪  Full-body immersion, mind-body flow, and rhythm
- 🕺🎵 Dynamic and music-driven environments with iconic tracks 
- 🪐 Reimagined from SEGA’s iconic Dreamcast original

[media]

 #  🚀 A Sensory Experience—Move, Hear, See, and Feel like never before

Feel your body and mind in perfect sync—stimulated yet relaxed—fully immersed in sound, motion, and space. C-Smash VRS redefines how games make you move, hear, see, and feel.

[media]

 # 💪 Full-Body Gameplay for Everyone

 With intuitive controls and full-body movement, you'll be swinging, smashing, and dodging in no time. Play your way—standing, seated, left- or right-handed. Smart accessibility options make it effortless for anyone to jump in and get active—no gym required.

[media]

 # 🎵 Smash to the Beat with Tracks from Legendary DJs

Play 1v1, Co-Op with a friend, or push your limits in Infinity Mode. Every swing, step, and smash pulses with music and responsive environments.  

The soundtrack features original tracks by legendary DJs including DJ Ken Ishii (Rez Infinite), Danalogue (The Comet is Coming), and UNKLE, creating a hypnotic, synesthetic rhythm that flows through every match.


# Ready to Play? :)
[media]
